name: Smothered Chicken II
ingredients: 3-4 small zucchini, in thin half moons, about 12 ounces
utensils: Very large non-stick skillet or wok

instructions.en: Flatten chicken breasts with a meat mallet; season on both sides with seasoning salt, pepper and garlic powder.
Grill chicken on an outdoor or indoor grill; keep warm.
Heat 2-3 tablespoons butter and a tablespoon of oil in a very large non-stick skillet or wok.
Saut√© onion, peppers, zucchini, mushrooms and garlic on medium to high heat until tender and a little browned. Season with seasoning salt to taste.
Serve hot veggie mixture over the chicken.

notes: Makes 6-12 servings. Do not freeze. For 12 smaller servings, use large chicken breasts and cut them each in half.
